snippet: Mr. Biden’s exploration of a presidential candidacy has taken on a new seriousness as he and his aides have contacted donors.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr is making contact with donors who could help finance a 2016 presidential campaign, signaling an increasingly serious exploration of his potential candidacy; some Democrats supporting Hillary Rodham Clinton, whose poll numbers are sliding, indicate they would consider supporting Biden if he joins race.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and MAGGIE HABERMAN
byline.contributor: Jackie Calmes and Carl Hulse contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Biden’s exploration of a presidential candidacy has taken on a new seriousness as he and his aides have contacted donors.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Woes Pushing Joe Biden to Reach Out to Those Who Could Back a Campaign
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Woes Pushing Biden to Reach Out
